epyr.fair.data_processing

Core data processing and metadata handling for FAIR format conversion.

This module contains functions for processing Bruker EPR parameters and preparing metadata for FAIR format export.

Functions

append_fair_metadata(data_dict, pars[, ...])

Append FAIR metadata to existing data dictionary.

extract_axis_info(pars)

Extract axis information from parameters.

get_experiment_summary(metadata)

Extract key experimental parameters for quick overview.

process_parameters(pars)

Process raw parameters using BRUKER_PARAM_MAP.

validate_fair_metadata(metadata)

Validate FAIR metadata for completeness and correctness.
epyr.fair.data_processing.process_parameters(pars: Dict[str, Any]) → Tuple[Dict[str, Any], Dict[str, Any]][source]

Process raw parameters using BRUKER_PARAM_MAP.

Parameters:

pars – Raw parameters dictionary from Bruker files

Returns:

Tuple of (fair_metadata, unmapped_parameters)

epyr.fair.data_processing.append_fair_metadata(data_dict: Dict[str, Any], pars: Dict[str, Any], original_file: str = '') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Append FAIR metadata to existing data dictionary.

Parameters:

  • data_dict – Existing data dictionary to append to

  • pars – Raw parameters from Bruker file

  • original_file – Original file path

Returns:

Updated data dictionary with FAIR metadata

epyr.fair.data_processing.extract_axis_info(pars: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Dict[str, Any]][source]

Extract axis information from parameters.

Parameters:

pars – Raw parameters dictionary

Returns:

Dictionary with x, y, z axis information

epyr.fair.data_processing.validate_fair_metadata(metadata: Dict[str, Any]) → List[str][source]

Validate FAIR metadata for completeness and correctness.

Parameters:

metadata – FAIR metadata dictionary

Returns:

List of validation warnings/errors

epyr.fair.data_processing.get_experiment_summary(metadata: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Extract key experimental parameters for quick overview.

Parameters:

metadata – FAIR metadata dictionary

Returns:

Dictionary with experiment summary
